lead_paragraph: Infielder Craig Counsell, who played the past two season for the Arizona Diamondbacks, returned to the Milwaukee Brewers yesterday, agreeing to a two-year, $6 million contract. Counsell, 36, is a native of the Milwaukee area and played for the Brewers in 2004. The Brewers’ infield appears set, with second baseman Rickie Weeks, shortstop J. J. Hardy and third baseman Corey Koskie, leaving Counsell in a backup role.
